titles.title: A bill to provide technical and financial support for the completion of the Interstate 11 environmental impact statement, and for other purposes.
A bill to provide technical and financial support for the completion of the Interstate 11 environmental impact statement, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Department of Transportation to provide technical and financial assistance to metropolitan planning organizations and states for the completion of Tier II environmental impact statements for the development of Interstate 11 in Arizona.
